name: Transporters.io
author: transporters.io

sections.description:
Add a quote / booking form to your website quickly and easily. If you don’t already have the Transporters.io transport management system get it here

Badly designed quote forms costs you business – we did lots of testing to see exactly where, when and why customer stop filling in the form and go elsewhere. As a result of extensive ongoing research we have created the highest converting quote form on the market. Install Transporters.io today and watch your enquiries increase.

Customers no longer want to email a quote request and wait days for a reply. They expect instant pricing, booking and confirmation. Transporters.io supports any transport operator and this plugin has custom script and style control to easily add tracking scripts and other modifications to match the design of your website.

Click here if experiencing Google Maps issues

What is Transporters.io?

Transporters.io is an online booking, business and communication management tool built specifically for the transport industry. It is optimised for group transport and private hire but also adapts for a lot of different uses.

  • Coach hire
  • Bus charter
  • Bus rental
  • Minibus hire
  • Airport transfers
  • Shuttle runs
  • Contract hire
  • Chauffeur drive
  • Limo/taxi Reservation
  • Vehicle rental
  • Fleet Management
  • Dispatch System
  • and much more…..

If you just want to ability to generate instant online quotes and collect bookings and payment 24 hours per day then go ahead and install the plug in, configure your Transporters.io system for your business and away you go.

What can it do?

Transporters.io helps you run your transport business smoothly and efficiently, keeping all of your data securely in one place and automating your most time consuming tasks.

  • Take bookings through your website by adding quote forms using this plugin.
  • Price jobs manually or automatically using pricing rules that adapt to your business.
  • Locate address through google maps and google places
  • Take payments online through paypal or several other payment providers.
  • Email customers on demand, on a schedule or triggered by events, all without leaving the system.
  • Assign drivers to jobs and notify all parties concerned.
  • Market leading simple drag and drop scheduling screen for daily driver allocations.
  • Generate repeating jobs automatically based on your desired schedule.
  • Full reporting and accounting solutions, including exports to cloud accounting solutions such as Xero.
  • GPS tracking via Android drivers mobile app.
  • and much more…..

How can I get started?

If this sounds like what you need to supercharge your transport business then it is time to get started!

Click here to signup for a Free trial.

Within minutes you can have your account setup and can have your vehicles, prices, payment options and drivers entered in under 30 minutes.

After that getting the quote forms on your website is as simple as installing this plugin and choosing where to place it.

Now when new quotes come in you can manage them from anywhere, using any device, even while out on the road. Your business will never be the same again (in a good way)!
sections.installation:
1. Signup at Transporters.io
  2. Install plugin through wordpress plugin system
  3. Configure your quote forms
  4. Register for Google Maps Key
  5. Add quote forms as widget or shortcode
sections.faq:
Who should install our plugin

Our plugin is only useful for subscribers of Transporters.io
Our software comes with a free trial to see if it works for you, so if you run a transport company but don’t yet use Transporters why not give it a try.

What if I already use another system?

Unfortunately this plugin only works with Transporters.io so you wont be able to connect it to your existing transportation booking management system.

However Transporters.io is very easy to learn, very powerful and the most affordable product on the market.
If you have access to your existing data we can assist with getting your past bookings moved across making the switch very simple.

So if you currently use distinctive systems, sengario, ecoachmanager, roeville, dte, the booking system, Hudson Group HGTS, alp systems or any other dispatch / despatch solution we suggest you signup for a free account, give Transporters.io a trial run and speak to our helpful staff about switch over!

sections.reviews:
Vague Documentation and Responses from Support

By (tldagent) on April 14, 2021

Spent several hours trying to set this up for our application. Basically we have an airport shuttle that goes from several airports to a designated group of locations with mile radius. When testing it didn't work as expected so I took the time to write out several questions for support. Mark from Transporters.io responded vaguely, basically answering only 1 question out of the 20 or so I had submitted. My two page list of questions was answered with 1 sentence that actually didn't offer any insight or answer at all. Not even suggestions. The date and time format was one question, along with Child Car seats... No answers provided at all. For us, the time spent setting this up was a waste of time that could have been avoided from the very beginning. GravityForms might actually be able to be used in it's place and more accurately. Just takes a little more setting up with filters based on zip codes and addresses.

SO easy to set up for non technical people, and a great overall product

By busandcoach on October 6, 2016

This quote form is 1000 times easier than other systems. The support is extremely responsive and helpful and the overall software is very powerful. Transporters had an instant impact on my business and we now have more bookings.

Great Plugin!

By Therz (therz1992) on September 30, 2016

Really great plugin, so easy to setup and configure. I can't believe this entire system is ran by a wordpress plugin!

Fantastic Experience - So Easy To Use

By PDS Consulting (thaiexpatservicecenter) on September 29, 2016

I have installed and used this plugin on multiple websites with no issues whatsoever. In just a few minutes you can be up and running with a full transport management system for your business. Cannot recommend enough!

Best transport management software

By ecoachmanager on September 28, 2016

Have tried the others but amazed by how much easier Transporters.io was to use, could even install the quote form on my website in minutes without any help, brilliant!

short_description: Easily add Transporters.io quote forms to your site. Ideal for minibus, coach and bus hire / charter - specifically prebooked private hire.
